name: Performapal Lebellman
description:
Pendulum Effect
 Once per turn: You can increase the Levels of all Pendulum Summoned monsters you control by 1 (even if this card leaves the field).

 Monster Effect
 Once per turn: You can target 1 other "Performapal" monster you control, and declare a Level from 1 to 5; reduce this card's Level by the declared Level, and if you do, increase the targeted monster's Level by the declared Level. These changes last until the end of this turn.
